snippet.title: Emerald Ties SAGE 2016 Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the game at http://www.sagexpo.org

Trailer music is Mango Lassi by Xversa:
https://soundcloud.com/xversa/mango-lassi

Formerly known as Emerald Ties: Crossing Fates, Emerald Ties has been in development on and off beginning in 2004. Since then, the game has undergone numerous changes and revisions, all the while never deviating from the original goal: to provide players with a fresh take on the tried-and-true gameplay of the original Sonic trilogy.

SAGE 2016 marks the first instance of the project running on the Sonic Worlds engine. Alongside the features and physics inherent to the Sonic Worlds engine, the game includes:

- Original and highly customized graphics
- An assortment of brand new zones, each with a unique set of enemies
- Original tracks and compositions
- Leaderboards for time attack and scores (to be added in the future)

Because the game was only recently ported to Sonic Worlds, this demo acts as a short content tease for the project to come. Please enjoy one act each of two familiar levels and one new one for SAGE 2016.

Website: http://emeraldties.thisisourcorner.net/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EmeraldTies
Andy Tunstall’s compositions for Emerald Ties: https://soundcloud.com/tunners/sets/emerald-ties

Emerald Team is:
Gamerdude, Naoshi, Blyde, and Rael0505

© SEGA. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. SONIC THE HEDGEHOG CHARACTERS © SEGA. SEGA, THE SEGA LOGO AND SONIC THE HEDGEHOG ARE EITHER REGISTERED TRADEMARKS OR TRADEMARKS OF SEGA CORPORATION. EMERALD TEAM DOES NOT CLAIM OWNERSHIP OF SONIC THE HEDGEHOG OR ITS CHARACTERS. THIS PROJECT IS NOT-FOR-PROFIT AND IS STRICTLY INTENDED TO BE A FAN TRIBUTE. PLEASE DON'T SUE US, WE JUST REALLY LIKE SONIC THE HEDGEHOG.
